name: dartness
desc: The core libraries of the Dartness framework.

name: Dartness
desc:
A server that delivers content, such as web pages, using the HTTP protocol
by HttpServer.

name: Dartness
desc:
Creates a DefaultDartnessServer that listens on the specified port and
internetAddress.

name: addController
desc:
Add controller into Dartness and handles
the methods annotated with Bind children to Controller and Bind.method.

name: addErrorHandler
desc: Adds an interceptor in order to listen between an http request

name: addInterceptor
desc: Adds an interceptor in order to listen between an http request

name: addMiddleware
desc: Adds a middleware in order to listen before the http request

name: close
desc:
Permanently stops the Dartness server from listening for new
connections. This closes the Stream of HttpRequests with a
done event.

name: create
desc: Starts the _server.

name: exception
desc: Library that exposes the API for the exceptions

name: CatchError
desc: Annotation to mark a method that is handling the errors.

name: errors
desc: The errors that are handled by the CatchError.

name: DartnessCatchError
desc:
A wrapper class in order to retrieve the error handler instance from the
annotation ErrorHandler and the data required to handle it internally by the
Dartness framework.

name: canHandle
desc: Checks if the error handler can handle the error by runtimeType.

name: errorTypes
desc: The error types that the error handler can handle.

name: handler
desc: The error handler function.

name: DartnessCatchErrorRegister
desc: Interface that is used to handle the errors.

name: addCatchError
desc: Adds an error handler to the error handler.

name: handle
desc: Method that handles the error by the errors added by addCatchError.

name: DartnessErrorHandler
desc:
A wrapper class in order to retrieve the error handler instance from the
annotation ErrorHandler and the data required to handle it internally by the
Dartness framework.

name: catchErrors
desc: The error types that the error handler can handle.

name: errorHandler
desc: The controller instance.

name: ErrorHandler
desc: An annotation that indicate that a class is an error handler.

name: HttpStatusException
desc:
Exception for HTTP status code.
This abstract class is used to create custom exceptions for HTTP status codes.

name: message
desc: The message of the exception.

name: statusCode
desc: The http status code of the exception.

name: route
desc: Library that exposes the API for the route

name: Bind
desc: Annotation for a bindable property.

name: method
desc: The method to bind the property to.

name: path
desc:
The path to bind the property to.
If not set, the entire route would be by Controller.

name: Body
desc: Annotation indicating a method parameter should be bound to the body of the http request.

name: Connect
desc: Route annotation. Routes Put requests to the specified path.

name: Controller
desc:
Annotation to identify a class as a controller.
A controller is a class that can be used to handle requests.

name: ControllerRoute
desc:
The data required to handle the class annotated with Controller
internally by the Dartness framework.

name: handler
desc: The function to be called when executing the route.

name: headers
desc: The headers of the route if indicated.

name: httpCode
desc: The http code of the route if indicated.

name: method
desc: The http method name of the route.

name: params
desc: The params of the route.

name: path
desc: The path of the route.

name: DartnessController
desc:
A wrapper class in order to retrieve the controller instance from the
annotation Controller and the data required to handle it internally by the
Dartness framework.

name: controller
desc: The controller instance.

name: routes
desc: The routes that the controller can handle.

name: DartnessParam
desc:
The param data from the route method required to handle the class
annotated with Controller internally by the Dartness framework.

name: defaultValue
desc: The default value of the param.

name: fromJson
desc: The function to convert the param from json.

name: isBody
desc: Whether the param is a body param.

name: isNamed
desc: Whether the param is a named param.

name: isOptional
desc: Whether the param is optional.

name: isPath
desc: Whether the param is a path param.

name: isPositional
desc: Whether the param is a positional param.

name: isQuery
desc: Whether the param is a query param.

name: name
desc: The name of the param.

name: type
desc: The type of the param.

name: DartnessRouter
desc: A router that can be used to handle requests.

name: add
desc: Adds a new ControllerRoute.

name: DartnessRouterHandler
desc:
A router handler for handling request for a ControllerRoute
with his metadata and the method ControllerRoute.handler with the metadata.

name: handleRoute
desc: Handles the route's response and invoke the Function in ControllerRoute.handler

name: DefaultDartnessRouter
desc: A router that can be used to handle requests.

name: add
desc: Adds a ControllerRoute to the _router and handles the request for it.

name: Delete
desc: Route annotation for delete request.

name: Get
desc: Route annotation. Routes Get requests to the specified path.

name: Head
desc: Route annotation. Routes Head requests to the specified path.

name: Header
desc: Annotation indication to specify a custom response header

name: Headers
desc: Annotation indication to specify a custom response headers

name: HttpCode
desc: An annotation to indicate what HTTP status code must be returned.

name: code
desc: Status code

name: Options
desc: Route annotation. Routes Options requests to the specified path.

name: Patch
desc: Route annotation. Routes Patch requests to the specified path.

name: PathParam
desc: Annotation to bind a property to a path parameter.

name: name
desc:
The name of the variable parameter.
If not set, the property name will be used.

name: Post
desc: Route annotation. Routes Post requests to the specified path.

name: Put
desc: Route annotation. Routes Put requests to the specified path.

name: QueryParam
desc: Annotation to bind a property to a query parameter.

name: name
desc:
The name of the variable parameter.
If not set, the property name will be used.

name: Trace
desc: Route annotation. Routes Put requests to the specified path.

name: server
desc: Library that exposes the API for the server

name: DartnessInterceptor
desc:
DartnessInterceptor is an interface in order to handle the request before it is executed
and handle the response after the request is executed.

name: onError
desc: This method is called when an error occurs when executing the request.

name: onRequest
desc: This method is called before the request is executed.

name: onResponse
desc: This method is called after the request is executed.

name: DartnessMiddleware
desc:
DartnessInterceptor is an interface in order to handle the request before it is executed
this can be helpful if you want to log the request or do something else before the request is executed.

name: handle
desc: This method is called before the request is executed.

name: DartnessPipeline
desc:
A helper that makes it easy to compose a set of DartnessMiddleware, DartnessMiddleware and a
Handler.

name: addErrorHandler
desc:
Returns a new DartnessPipeline with errorHandler added to the existing set of
handlers.

name: addHandler
desc: Returns a new Handler with handler

name: addInterceptor
desc:
Returns a new DartnessPipeline with dartnessInterceptor added to the existing set of
DartnessInterceptor.

name: addMiddleware
desc:
Returns a new DartnessPipeline with dartnessMiddleware added to the existing set of
DartnessMiddleware.

name: DartnessRequest
desc: A http request class that is used in the Dartness framework

name: body
desc: The body as a string.

name: bytes
desc: The body as a byte array stream.

name: headers
desc:
The HTTP headers with case-insensitive keys.
The returned map is unmodifiable.

name: method
desc: The http method associated with the request.

name: requestedUri
desc: The original requested Uri.

name: url
desc: The requested url relative to the current handler path.

name: DartnessResponse
desc: A http response class that is used in the Dartness framework

name: body
desc: Returns a Future containing the body as a string.

name: bytes
desc: Returns a Stream representing the body.

name: headers
desc:
The HTTP headers with case-insensitive keys.
The returned map is unmodifiable.

name: statusCode
desc: The HTTP status code of the response.

name: DartnessServer
desc: An interface that defines the methods that a server must implement.

name: addController
desc: Adds a controller and handles the http methods

name: addErrorHandler
desc: Adds a error handler in order to listen for errors

name: addInterceptor
desc: Adds an interceptor in order to listen before the http request

name: addMiddleware
desc:
Adds a middleware in order to listen between an http request
and the applications running on it.

name: getAddress
desc: Returns the InternetAddress that the server is listening on.

name: getPort
desc: Returns the port that the server is listening on.

name: start
desc: Starts the server.

name: stop
desc: Permanently stops the server from listening for new connections.

name: DefaultDartnessPipeline
desc:
Default implementation of DartnessPipeline that uses shelf Pipeline
in order to provide an efficient way of create DartnessMiddleware
and DartnessInterceptor.

name: addErrorHandler
desc:
Returns a new DartnessPipeline with errorHandler added to the existing set of
handlers.

name: addHandler
desc: Returns a new Handler with handler

name: addInterceptor
desc:
Returns a new DartnessPipeline with dartnessInterceptor added to the existing set of
DartnessInterceptor.

name: addMiddleware
desc:
Returns a new DartnessPipeline with dartnessMiddleware added to the existing set of
DartnessMiddleware.

name: DefaultDartnessServer
desc:
A server that delivers content, such as web pages, using the HTTP protocol
by HttpServer.

name: DefaultDartnessServer
desc:
Creates a DefaultDartnessServer that listens on the specified _port and
internetAddress.

name: addController
desc:
Add controller into _controllers and handles
the methods annotated with Bind children classes to Controller.path and Bind.path.

name: addErrorHandler
desc: Adds a error handler in order to listen for errors

name: addInterceptor
desc: Adds an interceptor in order to listen before the http request

name: addMiddleware
desc:
Adds a middleware in order to listen between an http request
and the applications running on it.

name: getAddress
desc: Returns the InternetAddress that the server is listening on.

name: getPort
desc: Returns the port that the server is listening on.

name: isStarted
desc: Returns true if the server is listening for connections.

name: start
desc:
Starts an HttpServer that listens by the specified _internetAddress and
_port.

name: stop
desc:
Permanently stops the HttpServer server from listening for new
connections. This closes the Stream of HttpRequests with a
done event.

name: LogRequestsInterceptor
desc:
Middleware which prints the time of the request, the elapsed time for the
inner handlers, the response's status code and the request URI.

name: onError
desc: This method is called when an error occurs when executing the request.

name: onRequest
desc: This method is called before the request is executed.

name: onResponse
desc: This method is called after the request is executed.
